Description: * The 10% move speed slow from taking damage is now a 20% slow only for the portion over the hero's base move speed
* Move Speed bonuses now stack diminishingly
* Base move speed reduced by 0.1 (except for heroes lower than 6.5)
* Heroes with move speed spirit scaling have the values reduced by 40%
* Updated move speed values on items:

* {{PageRef|Active Reload}}: Move speed reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Backstabber}}: Move speed reduced from 1.75 to 1.5​- {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: Move speed reduced from 3.5 to 3.25​- {{PageRef|Enduring Speed}}: Move speed reduced from 2.25 to 2.0​- {{PageRef|Guardian Ward}}: Move speed reduced from 3 to 2.75​- {{PageRef|Spirit Shielding}}: Move speed reduced from 1.75 to 1.5​- {{PageRef|Weapon Shielding}}: Move speed reduced from 1.75 to 1.5​- {{PageRef|Blood Tribute}}: Move speed reduced from 2.25 to 2​- {{PageRef|Burst Fire}}: Move speed reduced from 1.5 to 1.25​- {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Move speed reduced from 2 to 1.75​- {{PageRef|Heroic Aura}}: Move speed reduced from 2.5 to 2.25​- {{PageRef|Counterspell}}: Move speed reduced from 2 to 1.75​- {{PageRef|Debuff Remover}}: Move speed reduced from 2.5 to 2.25​- {{PageRef|Fortitude}}: Move speed reduced from 1.5 to 1.25​- {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Invis move speed reduced from 4 to 3.5​- {{PageRef|Radiant Regeneration}}: Move speed reduced from 2 to 1.75​- {{PageRef|Surge of Power}}: Move speed reduced from 2 to 1.75​- {{PageRef|Frenzy}}: Move speed reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Frenzy}}: Active move speed reduced from 3 to 2.5​- {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}}: Move speed reduced from 3 to 2.75​- {{PageRef|Healing Tempo}}: Move speed reduced from 1.5 to 1.25​- {{PageRef|Juggernaut}}: Move speed reduced from 2.25 to 2​- {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Move speed reduced from 3 to 2.5​- Sprint ramp rate reduced from 0.75/sec to 0.6/sec
* Sprint now starts accelerating for sprint speeds over +2.5 rather than only after +3
* Base sprint speed reduced by 0.4
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: Sprint speed spirit power scaling reduced from 0.6 to 0.5
* Updated sprint values on items:

* {{PageRef|Sprint Boots}}: Sprint reduced from 2.2 to 2.0​- {{PageRef|Long Range}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Swift Striker}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Mystic Slow}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Heroic Aura}}: Sprint reduced from 2 to 1.5​- {{PageRef|Hunter's Aura}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}}: Sprint reduced from 1.5 to 1​- {{PageRef|Rescue Beam}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Trophy Collector}}: Sprint reduced from 2.2 to 2.0​- {{PageRef|Disarming Hex}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Shadow Weave}}: Sprint reduced from 2 to 1.5​- {{PageRef|Lightning Scroll}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Vortex Web}}: Sprint reduced from 1 to 0.75​- {{PageRef|Enduring Speed}}: Slow resist reduced from 30% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: Active slow resist reduced from 40% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Cooldown increased from 34s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Barrier scaling per boon reduced from 10 to 8
* Bonus Health on all Weapon and Spirit items is reduced by ~25
* Vitality investment tree bonuses changed from a % of base health to a fixed amount (from +8/10/13/17/34/39/44/48/52/56% to +75/125/200/275/525/625/750/1000/1200/1400)
* {{PageRef|Colossus}}: Bonus Health reduced from +600 to +300
* {{PageRef|Colossus}}: Now grants +15% Base Health
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Cooldown increased from 0.8s to 1.2s
* Spirit investment tree 4.8k bonus reduced from 45 to 38
* {{PageRef|Surge of Power}} {{PageRef|Imbued Ability}} Spirit reduced from 28 to 24
* {{PageRef|Rapid Recharge}} Charged Ability Spirit reduced from 20 to 16
* {{PageRef|Crippling Headshot}}: Bullet and Spirit Resist reduction from -18% to -16%
* {{PageRef|Focus Lens}}: Spirit Resist reduction reduced from -12% to -9% (affects {{PageRef|Spirit Sap}})
* {{PageRef|Spirit Snatch}}: Spirit Resist steal reduced from 15% to 12%
* {{PageRef|Tankbuster}}: Changed from doing % of Max Health to a % of Current Health
* {{PageRef|Tankbuster}}: Damage dealt increased from 5% to 7.5%
* {{PageRef|Trooper}} bounty reduced by 12%
* {{PageRef|Shrine}}s health increased from 3000 to 7000
* Killing both enemy shrines will now make all of your troopers stronger (30% hp and 30% damage)
* {{PageRef|Walker}} {{PageRef|Rocket Barrage}} radius reduced from 6m to 5m
* Medic {{PageRef|Soul Orb|alt_name=orbs}} now heals allied troopers 30% more
* Medic {{PageRef|Soul Orb|alt_name=orbs}} regen on allied troopers is now applied over 8s instead of 2s
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}} HP increased from 260 to 350 (default trooper is 300)
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}} DPS vs other troopers increased from 35 to 45 (default trooper is 35)
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}}s attack range vs troopers and players increased by +5m over the default
* Medic Pack pickup range scales from 18m→26m to 18m→30m (over the same time period, 10min to 18min)
* Urn: Bounty increased from 700 + 230/min to 1300 + 230/min
* Urn: Comeback bounty now gives more {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=souls}}
* Urn: Bullet and Spirit resist for carrier increased from 30% to 50%
* Urn: Bonus bounty for carrier increased from 25% to 35%
* Increased kill bounty for solo kills (1 attacker in the kill) by 25%, and by 15% for duo kills
* Increased portion of the bounty the killer gets relative to the assist portion
* Increased comeback bounties for losing team a bit
* Getting hit while on Jump Pad during the window now deals 15% max hp damage
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}} HP reduced by 20%
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}} HP growth increased from 0.5%/min to 2.1% (less HP before ~15 minutes, more afterwards)
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s spirit resistance increased by 5%
* {{PageRef|Sinner's Sacrifice}} bounty reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Cultist Sacrifice}}: Cooldown increased from 260s to 270s

* Unsecured {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name={{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}}s}} claim period reworked. Previously the way it worked was any unsecured {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name={{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}}s}} you gained were added to a rolling 165s window, where it was divided over that time and given out, with a minimum amount given per second of 1 {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}}. The new system drains 0.5% (of the remaining {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name={{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}}s}}) + 1.6 (scales with the 8% bounty growth per minute).
There are a few examples below to show how they compare. Old was 165s (assuming bounty was at least 165s). New is:
1x Small Camp: 77s​2x Medium Camps: 163s​1x Hard Camp: 193s​4x Medium Camps: 230s​2x Hard Camps: 263s​1x Hard Camp + 3x Medium Camps: 270s​2x Hard Camp + 6x Medium Camps: 354s​
* Fixed a bug causing AP Rounds to reduce damage on targets with negative resist
* When {{PageRef|Armor Piercing Rounds}} Proc's, {{PageRef|Plated Armor}} can no longer stop the Proc'd Bullet.
* Fixed {{PageRef|Curse}} dispelling targets with {{PageRef|Unstoppable}} state
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: Health regen reduced from 3 to 2.5
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} non-player effectiveness reduced from 35% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} {{PageRef|Light Melee|alt_name=light melee}} effectiveness reduced from 50% to 40%
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Chain Gang}} will now break slightly faster when target is out of LOS
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} spirit scaling range reduced from 0.2 to 0.1
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: Health regen reduced from 2.5 to 1.75
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Stamina dash distance moved to bucket 3 (slower)
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Essence Bomb}} self damage spirit scaling reduced from 1.6 to 1.8
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Malice}} self damage increased from 7% to 9%
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: Move speed reduced by 0.2
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: Bullet damage per boon reduced from 0.616 to 0.5
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} cooldown increased from 2.5s to 2.6s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} max range from 45m to 40m
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Traveler}} cooldown increased from 145s to 155s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Traveler}} T1 cooldown from -25s to -35s
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} deferred damage reduced from 30% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} T2 deferred damage increased from 10% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Rage buildup rate reduced by 6%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} cast range reduced from 15m to 13m
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} T2 reduced from +90 Max Bonus Damage to 80
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: Bullet damage per boon reduced from 0.17 to 0.14
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Project Mind}} T2 spirit scaling reduced from 2.44 to 1.7
